ServiceWorkerGlobalScopeSkipWaiting.summary: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.skipWaiting() method of the forces the waiting service worker to become the active service worker.

remarks.para: Use this method with to ensure that updates to the underlying service worker take effect immediately for both the current client and all other active clients.
